Hexo noted

Change Theme

  1. pull the themes library to the themes folder
  2. change theme:XXX in the _config.yml

Deploy to gihub

  1. set github path to deploy: in the _config.yml
  2. run cli
    1. hexo clean
    2. hexo generate
    3. hexo deploy
